      • Odometer

        public Odometer(int INTERVAL,
        boolean autostart,
        double x,
        double y,
        double theta)
        Class constructor specifying motors, thread refresh rate, and the state of the thread
        Parameters:
        leftMotor - the robot's left motor
        rightMotor - the robot's right motor
        INTERVAL - the refresh rate of the timer thread
        autostart - the state of the thread (on or off)
        See Also:
        Timer, TimerListener
